home.title: Data Structures Portfolio
home.description: This is a collection of exercises and examples related to the Data Structures course.
home.backend: The backend runs on AWS using Java-based Lambdas and API Gateway.
home.iaac: The infrastructure is managed via Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and CI/CD through GitHub Actions.
home.markdown: Each exercise includes a Markdown explanation rendered in the frontend.
home.execution: Exercises can be executed remotely via Java Lambda functions.
